readme:
Capture client inquiries from any webform and send them straight into Google Sheets â€” automatically. No code. No headaches.

ğŸš€ What It Does:

SmartLead Sheet Sync is a plug-and-play automation that:  
â€¢ Instantly receives form submissions from your website or funnel via a webhook  
â€¢ Extracts and formats key info (like name, email, business name, message, timeline, budget)  
â€¢ Logs everything into a Google Sheet â€” in real time

Perfect for freelancers, digital agencies, consultants, and productized service owners who want to stop copying/pasting leads manually.

â¸»

âš™ï¸ What You Get:  
â€¢ A pre-built 3-step automation (Webhook â†’ Code â†’ Google Sheet)  
â€¢ Ready-to-use setup in n8n (free and open source automation tool)  
â€¢ Clean, editable JavaScript code to format your incoming lead data  
â€¢ Google Sheet connection that logs every new inquiry in its own row
